text: The 2008 LPGA Championship was the 54th LPGA Championship, played June 5–8 at Bulle Rock Golf Course in Havre de Grace, Maryland. This was the second of four major championships on the LPGA Tour in 2008. The champion was tour rookie Yani Tseng, age 19, with a playoff victory over Maria Hjorth. The two finished regulation play at 276 (−12), one stroke ahead of Annika Sörenstam and Lorena Ochoa. Tseng birdied the fourth extra hole for her first career win on the LPGA Tour and became the first rookie to win a major in a decade. This championship was played at Bulle Rock for five consecutive seasons, 2005 through 2009. ==Past champions in the field== ===Made the cut=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Player || Country || Year(s) won || R1 || R2 || R3 || R4 || Total || To par || Finish |- | align=left|Annika Sörenstam || align=left| || 2003, 2004, 2005 || 70 || 68 || 68 || 71 || 277 || −11 || T3 |- | align=left|Karrie Webb || align=left| || 2001 || 71 || 71 || 69 || 73 || 284 || −4 || T29 |- | align=left|Suzann Pettersen || align=left| || 2007 || 71 || 68 || 74 || 72 || 221 || −3 || T34 |- | align=left|Se Ri Pak || align=left| || 1998, 2002, 2006 || 72 || 74 || 74 || 74 || 287 || −1 || T46 |- |} Source: ===Missed the cut=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Player || Country || Year(s) won || R1 || R2 || Total || To par |- | align=left|Laura Davies || align=left| || 1994, 1996 || 75 || 75 || 149 || +5 |- | align=left|Meg Mallon || align=left| || 1991 || 76 || 74 || 150 || +6 |} Source: == Round summaries == === First round=== Thursday, June 5 2008 {| class="wikitable" !
